Title: Best Burger
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Mike Benner, Mike Benner (staff writer)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Bob is in a "best burger" competition, but is at risk of losing when an important part of the burger is nowhere to be found.
